message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its immense value to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $1100000. This is a special opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a competitive rate.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $1100000 is still a bit higher than my budget allows. I'd be happy to purchase it for $1050000. This price would be mutually beneficial and allow us to close the deal quickly.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to adjust the price slightly. I am now offering the product at $1075000. This price reflects a reasonable compromise while still allowing us to maintain a favorable transaction for both parties.
